channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Palestinian flags on display, 18th June
item.description:
There are 2 large Palestian flags hanging out of the top floor flat in Queensbridge Court, Queensbridge Road. They have been there for over 2 weeks or more. Not only are they a fire hazard , but they are also very distressing for myself & my Jewish mother
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Queensbridge Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Approx 10 bags of rubbish dumped, 18th June
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Median Road, Hackney, London

item.title: 5 Lisson grove 1st mile bags., 18th June

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Lisson Grove, Marylebone, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Strumming line debris all over graveyard, 18th June
item.description:
I was at Chislehurst Cemetery today and was horrified to see a very large no. of lengths of trimmer wire discarded all over the graves and graveyard. Also strimmed items like plant pots in shreds littering the ground. Additionally the quality of grass cutting is poor and self seeded sycamores are being allowed to grow from some graves. Please can you inspect and do a thorough job?. Happy to meet on site to show you. Cllr Alison Stammers

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Beaverwood Road, Chislehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drains, all along Greek and Bateman st, 18th June
item.description:
Please unblock Greek St, Bateman St, Frith St, there are blocked drains. This will overflow when it rains, but meanwhile rather stinky.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 53, Greek Street, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: This football pitch is breaking my window, 18th June
item.description:
This football pitch doesn’t have a tank and is breaking our window. Every time is like two or three months. The time is gone and our window is broken twice because kids playing football and kicking the ball hard and he’s coming to our window. Can please someone come and close this football play area or put a tent on top of this

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kinglake Street, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple keys not working, 18th June
item.description:
The hangar's lock seems to be broken and residents cannot get in/ We have two spaces and neither keys work while a member of the street is having the same problem. Please could this be fixed ASAP as my space is about to expire and I need my bike. (2137)
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Digby Crescent, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Perry Street, North End, London

item.title: Trees getting too tall and blocking summer time sun in my garden, 18th June
item.description:
These trees at the back of Chelsworth Drive near Wrekin Road on the path at the bottom of Shrewsbury park have become so tall they block any sun entering my garden/home. Please could these be trimmed back? I have a south facing garden so to not have any sun is very disappointing. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wrekin Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet
